The current version has launched single person cultivation mode and multi person interaction scenes. Including: lifespan system, realm system, combat system, magic system, boss system, drop treasure system, Chat system, legacy system, and multi scenario PVE.

In the later stage, it will be open: mount system , multi scenario PVP, larger magical system, weapon system, equipment system, managed auction house, alchemy system, sect system, multi universe system, creation of small world system, etc

This is currently the first version, and the game will be updated five times to present exciting content to players.

Current version: Mainly aimed at improving cultivation by collecting herbs, eliminating low-level monsters to obtain fairy magic secrets, learning advanced fairy magic, and then going to eliminate high-level monsters.
At present, the multiplayer mode has poor support for non China regions, which may result in inability to connect to the server, causing both parties to be invisible.

item.title: Death of Marionette
item.description:
About This Game


Sawyer and her friends arrive at a ruined factory to prepare an event. While everyone’s busy, Sawyer experiences something strange inside the building.
Sometime later, Huck Finn, Sawyer’s boyfriend, arrives at the factory with some friends after receiving a text message from her...



  • An RPG Maker style adventure game with real time combat - clear your path with your trusty Steel Pipe. Enhance yourself and your weapons with items found on your adventure.
  • Beautiful illustrations and pixel sprites - Enjoy tens of pictures made by the main artists LuB2an and Coinman.
  • Moody piano music - 22 soundtrack pieces written by the artist Antler and the developer Gustav

item.title: ZAKESTA-Z
item.description:
About This Game

Shootung fights on all 5 sides with normal shots that power up by 5 stages and sub-weapons that power up by 3 stages.
You can consume a gauge to generate a circle called "Z-ZONE", and items captured within that range can be turned into high-scoring items.

*Select from 3 modes: "NORMAL", "ZOGEN" where the game rank changes, and "ZUTTOZ" where the highest rank is fixed.

*6 types of sub-weapons
[0] Fires a bullet that attacks in the opposite direction of your aircraft's movement.

[1] Emits a huge laser.

[2] Damages enemies and enemy bullets with a barrier.

[3] A ball rotating around your aircraft deals damage to enemies and enemy bullets.

[4] Fires a bullet that explodes when it hits an enemy.

[5] Fires a bullet that guides the enemy.

*Detailed explanation can be found in the Community Hub guide.

item.title: Snake Crush
item.description:
About This Game

The Ghost Dragon has truly been killed, and the spiritualized dragon vein once again rises into the sky, tearing a passage between reality and the spirit world. A massive influx of spiritual energy and sinister forces floods into the magic city, empowering countless monsters and demons, causing them to wreak havoc in the human world once again.
The Investigation Bureau has no choice but to dispatch their staff members who are most capable of withstanding the dragon's power, a group of rational serpent demons, to deal with this anomaly.





Let your hungry little snake devour the elements it meets like a greedy snake



Consume three identical elements to unleash skills to clear enemies





Gain experience, Level up, Acquire enhancements and Create your unique build





Confront the waves of monsters and persevere until the end of the mission

item.title: TERMINAL22
item.description:
About This Game

Take back what they stole from you.

You are part of the temporary testing team for project BEYOND and have been provided with a machine that can hack into any device in the world. You are asked to hack into devices and gather information to test the capabilities of this machine.



TERMINAL22 is a mix of bullet hell and puzzle gameplay, utilizing the aesthetic of an old operating system terminal. Hack into any system you can find, dig around in the files and uncover the secrets about your identity, the testing program, project BEYOND and the company behind it.



...before long you may realize that you might not be the only one looking into this.






  • One of the two main elements of gameplay is hacking. Through the game you will need to hack into many different devices. This is done through a navigating your way through a bullet hell arena and finding all of the "Security Nodes" in order to break the security of the machine and access it.






  • Once getting into the machines, you will partake in the second major part of the gameplay, the discovery. Dig through the system by using terminal commands, discover files, go through them to learn the necessary information to progress further in the game.

item.title: Abyss School
item.description:
About This Game


Yuhee is an ordinary girl who attends a private school.
While waiting for her school bus, she picked up a bright purple conch shell on the beach.
She fell asleep on the bus due to unbearable drowsiness. What unfolded in front of her when she woke up was a school that had sunk into the deep sea and an abyss of followers following the high priest.
She solves puzzles prepared by Abyss Followers, avoids terrible monsters, and begins a journey to escape this Abyss School and return to her original world.


Solve hidden items and puzzles
while avoiding abyss zombies and traps at school.


▷ Charming characters
▷ Tense gameplay
▷ Simple controls
▷ Various skins and cutscenes unlocked as you play

item.title: Secrets Under Eco
item.description:
About This Game

Secrets Under Eco is a story driven first person metroidvania with a unique spin on fps combat. Explore the military base of Melior and its surrounding area while collecting equipment and powerful upgrades.

Game Features

  • Fully Voice Acted Story: Melior is about to win the war against The Others. Ready to fight with his people, Jay wakes up alone in a jail cell in his own military base. Labeled a spy, and with an unknown voice in his head, will Jay be able to escape his captors he once called his friends?
  • Unique First Person Shooter Combat: Enemies take damage by slamming into walls and obstacles. Defeat combatants by launching them into whatever you can using your equipment and wits.
  • Exploration: Search for a way out of Melior's expansive military base. Find equipment, vending machines, audio diaries, and combat boosting upgrades along the way.
  • Visuals: Secrets Under Eco features a pleasing low poly, mostly grayscale art style.

item.title: Eyes Of Memes
item.description:
About This Game

One day you had the bad luck to fall through from your reality into some otherworld. Such incidents sometimes happen and now it has happened to you. From now on you have only one task - to find 8 pictures and leave this strange place.
In terms of gameplay Eyes Of Memes is a classic indie horror in which you have to explore the location in search of pictures. You don't have any weapons, you are always defenseless against the inhabitants of the place and if you encounter them, running away is the only way to escape.

Levels

You just went to sleep in your cozy bed in your home and when you wake up you find that you are in some dark creepy place... There are 6 levels available to you in the game: Morgue, School, Basement, Game Room, Backrooms and Desert. Visually all levels look different, but your goal is always the same - explore the location and collect all the pictures.

Hazards

Watch out if you hear strange noises or notice something moving in the dark. The inhabitants of this world only at first glance look funny and ridiculous, but they are not! Run. Don't stop, don't try to hide, just run! The creatures that inhabit this place are far more terrifying than anything you've seen before.

Eyes

While wandering through this strange place, you can discover mystical eye pills that allow you to look through the monster's distorted minds.

Progression

For successfully completing levels, you will earn experience points that can be spent to unlock new levels and enemies. Playing on a higher difficulty level will require more effort, but you will gain twice as much experience.

item.title: Familiars.io
item.description:
About This Game

what is this game?


it's a compact monster-catching fest in an online multiplayer world. It also has some optional hard stuff for people who like a challenge.

what's it like to play?


  • 1 battle = 1 levelup, and the max level is 15. I don't want to waste your time with rpg grinding
  • with only 20 Familiars in the game, you can max-out and understand all the familiars in the game within a few hours
  • ... and then you're ready for the hard stuff
  • find hidden portals to other dimensions, where you must manage your familiars' HP and your potion supply in a slew of battles against fairly smart CPU opponents
  • or, if you want, fight other players you meet in the world to test your mettle

what else is there to like?


  • it's extremely easy to pick up, play a bit, and put down
  • the only way to communicate with other players is by pressing the "howdy" button repeatedly, or running around in circles
  • I think the soundtrack is pretty nice
  • it's free btw

it's free?


Yeah this is just a hobby project made by one person. I don't need to make this my job, I just like it when people play my game lol!

item.title: Two Climbers
item.description:
About This Game

NOTE: This game requires 2 separate players who own the game to play!

Journey to the top!


Two Climbers is a two player platformer where you and a buddy work together to climb a top Mount Teawok.
Filled with puzzles and platforming challenges, explore the different parts of Mount Teawok on your way to the top!

Work Together


Utilize unlockable skills that allow you and your teammate to combine your efforts to accomplish tasks that are impossible alone!

Find Secret Collectables!


Hidden Moons can be found throughout Mount Teawok!
Can you find them all?

item.title: Who do you want to date? professional girls сollection
item.description:
About This Game



A confident policewoman, a tough military woman, a flirtatious tennis player, or a gentle artist? Or maybe someone else? Who do you want to date?

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level



In the game, your goal is to collect the puzzle in order to restore the pictures. (◕‿◕)♡

Special Features

  • 🎾 Animation scenes
  • 👮‍♀️ CG Gallery Mode
  • 🧹 Relaxing music
  • 👩‍⚕️ Puzzle game

item.title: Jumpfox: Always Running
item.description:
About This Game

"Jumpfox: Always Running" is a precision platformer that pushes the boundaries of your skills and patience. In this game, control is a unique twist – you don't control the running. Your character is in perpetual motion, always running forward, bouncing off walls to change direction. Your task is to master timing and reflexes, using only two actions: jump and dash.

Gameplay Highlights:


  • Automatic Running Mechanic: Experience the uniqueness of a platformer where the running is automatic, adding an extra layer of challenge and strategy to your gameplay.
  • Diverse Difficulty Modes: "Jumpfox: Always Running" features variations of the same map, each tailored to a different level of difficulty. From casual players to hardcore enthusiasts, the game scales its challenges to suit your skill level, ensuring an engaging experience for every type of player.
  • Solo and Multiplayer Fun: Whether you're looking to test your own limits in solo play or engage in exhilarating local multiplayer battles, "Jumpfox: Always Running" offers something for everyone.
  • Local Split-Screen Play: Dive into the split-screen mode for an intense competitive or cooperative experience with friends right in your living room.
  • The game's design focuses on minimalist graphics that highlight the gameplay mechanics, ensuring that your focus remains on the challenge at hand. The intuitive controls make it easy to pick up, but the game's difficulty curve ensures that only the most dedicated players will master it.



"Jumpfox: Always Running" isn't just a game; it's a test of determination, reflexes, and sheer willpower. Are you ready to take on the challenge?"

item.title: Far Lands
item.description:
About This Game

Get on the official Far Lands Discord Server:




Far Lands is a lightweight survival open-world game.

Lore:

You wake up and find out you are not home. In fact, what was home? There is no memory of that.

You are on a strange island and there is no time for panicking. Surviving is your only option. You start gathering food, crafting tools and building a base until you encounter something nobody sees every day.... A ZOMBIE! He starts attacking and you do too. He's dead for now... but who can assure he was the only one?

To find answers you start exploring more and more of the island, but the you only get more questions. Why are there are human build areas? Why there is no human life signs if there are human build areas? What was that skeleton?

Features:


  • Character hunger and thirst mechanics
  • Crafting
  • Gathering resources
  • Vehicle transportation (Buggy and MiniCopter)
  • NPC companion for Gathering Resources
  • NPC merchant
  • Procedural Spawning of resources and loot
  • Electricity
  • Hunting wildlife and fighting creatures
  • Base Building
  • Farming crops
  • Day/Night Cycle
  • Weather changes

The game is lightweight on mechanics because I feel the player would enjoy the adventure and having fun more.

item.title: Gordian Rooms 2: A curious island
item.description:
About This Game


The Isle of Lye is a specially constructed testing ground for the Gordian Society, and as fate would have it, you have ended up here.

It is up to you to rise to the challenge and find a way out of this place, all the while competing to become a full fledged member of this enigmatic organisation.


As you explore the island, you will get to know the quirky Lye family and their numerous associates. From servants to family members, everyone is more than they let on.

Can you find the black sheep of the family or the traitor in the mansion?
Or perhaps you'd prefer to search for someone else's carefully hidden treasures...
Will you get to the bottom of every mystery?

item.title: Ingression: The Portal Trial
item.description:
About This Game

Embark on an intergalactic adventure as Rina, a cunning thief in the year 2442 within the corrupt Galactic Empire. Get a preview of the game's start and tackle some tricky levels. Can you beat the challenges and triumph in this futuristic journey?


Get ready for a wild ride in a tricky platformer with mind-bending challenges and seamless portals that'll keep you on your toes!

Check out Ingression: The Portal Trial - free prologue with 25 levels to get a feel for what the game is all about!

Stay grounded as you navigate through the mind-bending levels that play tricks on your sense of direction.

Race against the clock as you tackle challenging levels – can you beat the timer?


Easy-to-use controls – just jump, use portals, think ahead, and climb. Yet, beneath the simplicity lies layers of expressive depth to master, turning every death into a valuable lesson. Swift respawns ensure you're back in action in the blink of an eye, always ready for another go.

item.title: Intravenous 2: Mercenarism
item.description:
About This Game

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2608270/Intravenous_2/


Step into the shoes of Gideon, a ruthless mercenary who cares about nothing but his wealth. Set two months before the events of Intravenous 2, you will take on seemingly simple jobs, the effects of which will ripple out and affect the main game's protagonist. But why should Gideon care? He's just in it for the money.

Key Features


  • Stealth or Firepower: the choice is yours. Sneak through shadows, turn off the lights, pick doors, or unleash a hail of bullets. The game will adapt to your play style.
  • Customize Your Skills: develop your skills the way you want to, whether it's mastering the art of stealth or becoming a gunslinging virtuoso.
  • Bullet Time: Gideon is no stranger to stimulants that enhance his cognitive abilities - bending time to give him the edge in tense situations.
  • Vast Arsenal: choose from firearms, gadgets, and a variety of ammo types to creatively tackle the challenge
  • Weapon Modification: personalize each firearm with suppressors, laser sights, and more, tailoring your arsenal to the task at hand.
  • Responsive AI: engage in intense combat with enemies that react to your actions, take cover, use tactics and call for backup.

item.title: The Social Engineer
item.description:
About This Game

Become the next top agent with The Social Engineer: explore companies, exploit vulnerabilities, deceive employees, and prevent dangerous attacks. As a Social Engineer Agent, conduct various targeted assaults on companies to uncover faulty security mechanisms. With diverse open-world settings and realistic virtual reality controls, an exciting and immersive experience awaits you, all without weapons and violence. The integrated Education Mode allows The Social Engineer to be used as a tool for training purposes.



Game Concept

In The Social Engineer, assume the role of a Social Engineer Agent with the aim of protecting companies and businesses from catastrophic attacks. Learn various Social Engineering techniques, apply them independently in different companies, and thereby expose dangerous vulnerabilities before criminals can exploit them. Spy in various departments, sneak into secret rooms, and uncover sensitive information about employees by using publicly available information and deceiving people, all without resorting to violence or weapons. Master the training to earn the title of a professional Social Engineer.



Missions

The game features 13 exciting missions in different settings and difficulty levels. From introductory missions to challenging ones:
  • Infiltrate a business meeting of an advertising agency as a purported businessman
  • Pose as a police officer and steal a laptop from a police station
  • Deceive a dock worker to operate a crane unnoticed
  • Disguise yourself as a janitor to take pictures of secret photoshoots
  • and much more
No prior knowledge or technical expertise is necessary for the missions.



Social Engineering Techniques

Utilize a constantly expanding repertoire of different Social Engineering techniques to achieve your goals.
  • Disguise yourself and pretend to be someone else
  • Sneak into monitored rooms
  • Explore private social media pages
  • Execute baiting attacks with QR codes
  • Hack into computers using manipulated USB sticks
  • Search trash bins for information
  • Use websites and public notices
  • Deceive employees in personal conversations or calls



Game Mechanics

The Social Engineer is a roomscale VR game, allowing you to freely move through the game world. Additionally, there's a teleportation function for covering long distances or moving between floors. Use the controllers as virtual hands to interact with objects, doors, and people. Your tablet contains essential information and apps such as a Social Engineering Wiki, a browser, a phone app, a building plan, a photo app, and a help app. There's also a Mission Instructor to assist you in missions.



Learning While Playing

The Social Engineer is a Serious Game based on typical cases in real Social Engineering security audits. It can be used for training to understand Social Engineering attacks and increase awareness of Social Engineering in both private and professional settings. The game concept was developed in collaboration with an IT security firm and scientifically accompanied. The special Educational Mode allows querying learned knowledge directly in the game.


Safety Guidelines

This game includes fast movements and on-screen text that may cause discomfort or eye strain in a few individuals. Take a break if you feel uneasy or experience symptoms of motion sickness, simulator sickness, or eye strain!

All locations, company names, logos, and individuals in the game are fictional. Similarities to real places, companies, or persons are unintended and purely coincidental. All Social Engineering attacks presented in the game are merely gameplay mechanics and should only be carried out in the real world by trained security experts.

About the Developers

We are zefwih, a small development studio from Germany. Although we may not compete with major providers, we develop all our games with attention to detail and great care. If you have suggestions, issues, praise, or feedback, feel free to reach out to us!

item.title: The Social Engineer
item.description:
About This Game

Become the next top agent with The Social Engineer: explore companies, exploit vulnerabilities, deceive employees, and prevent dangerous attacks. As a Social Engineer Agent, conduct various targeted assaults on companies to uncover faulty security mechanisms. With diverse open-world settings and realistic virtual reality controls, an exciting and immersive experience awaits you, all without weapons and violence. The integrated Education Mode allows The Social Engineer to be used as a tool for training purposes.



Game Concept

In The Social Engineer, assume the role of a Social Engineer Agent with the aim of protecting companies and businesses from catastrophic attacks. Learn various Social Engineering techniques, apply them independently in different companies, and thereby expose dangerous vulnerabilities before criminals can exploit them. Spy in various departments, sneak into secret rooms, and uncover sensitive information about employees by using publicly available information and deceiving people, all without resorting to violence or weapons. Master the training to earn the title of a professional Social Engineer.



Missions

The game features 13 exciting missions in different settings and difficulty levels. From introductory missions to challenging ones:
  • Infiltrate a business meeting of an advertising agency as a purported businessman
  • Pose as a police officer and steal a laptop from a police station
  • Deceive a dock worker to operate a crane unnoticed
  • Disguise yourself as a janitor to take pictures of secret photoshoots
  • and much more
No prior knowledge or technical expertise is necessary for the missions.



Social Engineering Techniques

Utilize a constantly expanding repertoire of different Social Engineering techniques to achieve your goals.
  • Disguise yourself and pretend to be someone else
  • Sneak into monitored rooms
  • Explore private social media pages
  • Execute baiting attacks with QR codes
  • Hack into computers using manipulated USB sticks
  • Search trash bins for information
  • Use websites and public notices
  • Deceive employees in personal conversations or calls



Game Mechanics

The Social Engineer is a roomscale VR game, allowing you to freely move through the game world. Additionally, there's a teleportation function for covering long distances or moving between floors. Use the controllers as virtual hands to interact with objects, doors, and people. Your tablet contains essential information and apps such as a Social Engineering Wiki, a browser, a phone app, a building plan, a photo app, and a help app. There's also a Mission Instructor to assist you in missions.

item.title: SHINORUBI
item.description:
About This Game


SHINORUBI is a Bullet hell style game up in the tradition of japanese Danmaku games.

SHINORUBI offers a fast-paced arcade action pack with great replayability thanks to the many available difficulty levels, arrange modes, different spaceships, online leaderboards and achievements. This is also one of a rarest vertical shooter entirely designed and optimized for widescreen monitor!

#1 Rule:
Only the very centre of the player's craft is vulnerable to enemy fire. You better avoid the mass of bullets aiming at you and destroy everything between you and your mission.


CLASSIC/ORIGINAL MODE
Complete all 5 levels with 3 starting lives to pass the 1CC (credit clear) challenge. You may add a few credits to help you to finish the game. 5 difficulty levels, including the easy mode with auto-bomb, or enemy shoots being canceled if you manage to destroy the shooter.

BOSS RUSH MODE
Fight only Bosses! Choose from 3 levels of difficulty.

SCORING SYSTEM
The scoring system is based on several parameters that provide you with point multipliers. Survive the barrage of enemy fire, destroy your enemies and collect stars and medals. All this while using your bombs as little as possible.

WORLDWIDE LEADERBOARD & ACHIEVEMENTS
A world wide leaderboard for each game modes with Steam Leaderboards, a personal leaderboard with all your scores per mode, and Steam Achievements.



FEVER
When your FEVER charge bar is full, it automatically triggers to cancel enemy shots on screen and improve your points. The side effects are boosted weaponry and improved bonus stars when you destroy your enemies.

CONTROLS AND DISPLAY
You can play SHINORUBI using a keyboard, a joystick, or an arcade controller, Steam Remote Play, and customize all the action buttons.
Made with an in-house super optimized, multi-threaded engine, this is not your average 2D shoot them up, it is a full grade PC game optimized,
in Ultra HD, with uncapped frame-rate support, super resolution support and 8K textures, That's why an Direct3D API Level 11 video card or Vulkan 1.1 is required.


Same game levels as the classic mode but with different rules.

  • SHIELD: Use a shield to protect against the enemy bullets.
  • CANCEL: Destroy marked spaceships to clear all shots on the screen.
  • LASER / SHOT: Alternate between laser and classic shots only when it is told!
  • JOURNEY: Get ready for a long journey with several game loops.
  • PINK PIG: Collect those pesky pigs before they left the screen while shooting the enemies.
  • SUPER RANK: The better your play, the higher the difficulty will change.



Select a pilot and his spaceship with unique weapons and characteristics among the 3 already available.




For 1000 years, the BAÄA family has reigned as despots on planet SHINORUBI. This planet is the source of the "R-R" substance which offers infinite power and exceptional longevity to its owners. For 150 years, the king of SHINORUBI, R.LOYD III, and his 6 sons have gone to war across space against the TRADDESS and ZOOGT empires, leaving his cruel daughter Nemesis and 5 generals to guard the planet.

A unique alliance of 8 experienced mercenaries will attempt to put an end to the dictatorship of the BAÄA family and its hold on the "R-R" compound by taking advantage of a singularity of the planet SHINORUBI which takes place once every thousand years. The endless night is coming on Kaddin, the capital of SHINORUBI, as spaceships are approaching.

item.title: Station 13
item.description:
About This Game

The AI of Station 13 LAH 13000 is defective and does not accept other forms of life. Run, jump and dodge in this 2D pixel art style precision platformer with
side-scrolling to get out safely from the deadly trap that the ship has become.

■ Single player space adventure.
■ Limited time to get out of each room.
■ Retrieve the keys and go back to open new doors.
■ Defeat AI-controlled machines.
■ Find the secret capsules scattered throughout Station 13.
■ Get to the evacuation ship to leave Station 13 and return home.







The controls and gameplay are easy to learn: jump, run to get further when jumping, lean on walls to climb and slide. If you die, you quickly respawn to keep moving forward.

item.title: Swing Solver
item.description:
About This Game

Control the swing at will and aim for the goal! Fascinating trajectories drawn by a pendulum. "Swing Solver" is an easy yet profound physics action puzzle.



  • Easy yet profound action using swing. All you need to do is click and release. But the actions are infinite!
  • Acceleration tiles, moving platforms, warp gates, and other obstacles that can drastically alter the ball's movement. If you can't control them, you'll hit a saw!
  • Replays show the beautiful trajectory drawn by the pendulum after each success. The cooler the success, the more beautiful the trajectory!
  • Simple graphics highlight the beautiful orbit of the pendulum. The world made of blue squares and round balls looks like a physics notebook.
  • Calm sounds that match the graphics.

The only actions used are firing and disconnecting the wire. It is a simple operation, but difficult to master. Where do you connect the wire? When to disconnect? Watch the movement of the pendulum and control the ball perfectly with a single wire!

item.title: Star Stuff: Prologue
item.description:
About This Game

Star Stuff: Prologue is a sneak peek into Star Stuff, a galactic blend of automation and strategic action! Join Mija on their first day working at a star factory! Program unique bots and work together in-time with them to solve thoughtfully-curated challenges and space-bending puzzles.

Key Features:
  • Automation: Program bots with a user-friendly interface, each with different skills to assist you like lifting, lasering, and more.
  • Strategic Action: Work together by performing actions in sync with your bots to solve puzzles and if you fail, brush off the stardust and try again!
  • High-Level but Low-Tension: Don’t stress while on the job! You can always restart, undo, and try puzzles again without getting fired.
  • Break Time: Head to the cozy lobby where you can interact with gizmos of the cosmos and chat with your fellow co-workers from across the galaxy!
  • Prologue only: Learn how to automate bots and get familiar with the world of Star Stuff!

Disclaimer: Kindly be aware that certain SFX, music, and assets showcased here might differ from the final build of the main game.

item.title: Roles & Dice
item.description:
About This Game

Roles & Dice is a meticulously crafted online virtual tabletop game, where imaginations run wild, and epic adventures await! Tailored for fans of tabletop RPGs, this game enables you to load any image file to construct immersive maps and draw your friends into exciting worlds, all from the comfort of your home!

Features:

🗺 Versatile Map Integration:
Load any image file as a map, allowing boundless possibilities to explore and create intricate worlds, designed by your imagination.

🎮 Distinctive Game Modes:
Engage in the Exploration mode where players control their characters in real-time, uncovering the realms set by the Game Master, or dive into riveting turn-based battles, strategizing every move.

💼 Dynamic Role-Playing:
One player takes on the role of the Game Master, orchestrating the universe's destiny, while others immerse themselves as characters in the unfolding tale.

🧙 Character & Group Creation:
Game Masters can forge characters, assemble groups, and craft maps, which can be saved and swiftly loaded to streamline gameplay during campaigns.

👥 Multiplayer Interaction:
Play with friends and experience collaborative storytelling, all while forging memories and facing challenges together.

🎢 User-Friendly Interface:
Designed with players in mind, Roles & Dice provides an intuitive and seamless experience, allowing easy navigation and game setup.

📜 Campaign Saving:
Save your meticulously created characters, maps, and groups for quick load and play, ensuring smooth transitions between sessions.

Engage in Unparalleled Adventure:
Whether you're exploring uncharted territories, battling formidable foes, or immersing yourself in stories untold, Roles & Dice provides the ultimate virtual tabletop experience, allowing you and your friends to create and live out your fantastical tales.

Embark on your journey in Roles & Dice and unravel the realms of endless possibilities! 🌌

item.title: Coloring Game: Studio
item.description:
About This Game

Coloring Game: Studio is now not only paint by numbers, but also a small graphics editor. You can not only get rid of stress by painting pixels, but also show your creative nature by changing the base pictures.

The game includes:

  • 150 pictures;
  • 3,600,000px;
  • Image editor;
  • Uploading your own images.
